metadata.title: CVE-2023-51885 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in Mathtex v.1.05 and before allows a remoteattacker to execute arbitrary code via the length of the LaTeX stringcomponent.

criterions.comment: mathtex: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
